title: Ask Riot: League Client Update and Death Recaps

replies.body: Why are you using a ranking System that goes by game wins instead of how well you do personally? How many games do people feed or afk or quit etc Yet if you do well and get say 27/3/15, but you lose the game because your team is on 1/15/0.. You won't rank up because your team was useless or afked etc. ELO doesn't work. Time to update the ranking system.

Because players who do well personally in losing teams are usually troll yi, who killsteal every kill, somehow clean up a 1v5 penta, then instead of taking the open inhibitor, goes b to buy another item
Because the game is more then your score...

I'm curious... if you're removing all traces of the idea that players are summoners, what about the champion lines that refer to summoners?

"Tactical decision, summoner."
Those are old, unupdated lines, the new champions/reworked ones don't have this. I imagine at some point riot is going to do a massive overhaul of lines.
And when they rework Sonas lines everyone will have a day of silence.

Rito its been 7 years and death recap is still 100% worthless. 100% of the time i get 100-0 i take about 500 dmg according to death recap, you may as well just delete the feature because after 7 years of it STILL doing nothing..i mean really....rito plz

So many critiques and complaints. If you start utilizing the death recap as a general guide to gain advantage over your enemy, and not definite figures, then you would not be asking for them to remove the feature. Information is knowledge, and knowledge is power in the right hands. Will a better, more updated death recap improve your gaming experience? Maybe, but very insignificantly.

An accurate recap will improve gameplay significantly, players can actually learn what just killed them and they can understand the game better from it. If it is giving inaccurate information then that "knowledge" you got will be flawed and if you try to rely on it, the result will be an unexpected outcome usually resulting in more deaths.

I was simply implying that I would rather have a flawed death recap, then no recap at all. In all my years of playing, I have never once thought about blaming the death recap as the reason for why I got outperformed and outplayed. To each their own,but I believe that when they fix the death recap, not much is gonna change in terms of global skill level as a whole.

Like pumah said incomplete information is misleading, and death recap is ALWAYS incomplete information, what is the thinking behind only 3 sources of dmg visible? it wouldn't be difficult to expand that to all 5 champs hitting u? and towers? why not? giving half the picture is really worthless. I'm not even commenting on the buggy features like "badalter" doing damage on TT, but specifically the design of it
Hey riot, i have a question and this is the only form i can ask, how come when i click the ask riot page, i cant ask riot unless i have a north american account?
